name: cat cubes: jam version
description:
disclaimer: this game was not made for a jam, the "jam version" subtitle is to set a quality expectation. imagine that this game is covered in sticky jam which causes it to occasionally break. i would like to completely remake this game to improve it, but i like this version of the game too so i want to release it. there are a few things broken at the moment, and i think the translations are incomplete. if you like this game, tell me on twitter and maybe i'll remake it good!

swipe or tap with mouse/touchscreen to control

swipe right to confirm a menu choice, swipe up/down to move cursor

swiping in a direction on a tile will clear all matching tiles in that direction

tapping on a 1 will clear it. 2s need 2 in a row, 3s need 3 in a row, 4s need 4 in a row

menus work with wasd/arrows as well, but recommend playing this fullscreen on mobile!
